name: ORS Non-Associations â€“ Specific Prisoner Group Version
description:
This report retrieves those Prisoners who have a current, active Non Association on their record based on a manual selection made when running the report.
ACC0078 - v1.0 Released: 05/09/2023

dataset.name: Non Association
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.COMMENT_TEXT, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_REASON_CODE, AT_OFFENDERS_NA.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS NA_NOMS_NUMBER, AT_OFFENDERS_NA.LAST_NAME AS NA_LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_NA.FIRST_NAME AS NA_FIRST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDERS_NA, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_NA, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS.OFFENDER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_NA.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS.OFFENDER_ID AND AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS.NS_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_NA.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_NA.OFFENDER_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code(s)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */ AND AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_EXPIRY_DATE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_NA.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for NOMS Number','A','Offender\NOMS Number',Multi,Free,Persistent,,User:0) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, COMMENT_TEXT, NS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, NS_TYPE, NS_REASON_CODE, NA_NOMS_NUMBER, NA_LAST_NAME, NA_FIRST_NAME, PRISONER_LOCATION.UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT AS V_OFF_CELL_LOCATION, NA_LOC.UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT AS V_NA_LOC FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Prisoner Location
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS.AGY_LOC_ID || '-' || AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS.LEVEL_1_CODE AS AGY_AND_LOCATION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.LIVING_UNITS AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID (+) = AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS.LIVING_UNIT_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code(s)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */ AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for NOMS Number','A','Offender\NOMS Number',Multi,Free,Persistent,,User:0) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AGY_AND_LOCATION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: NA Loc
dataset.query: DP0_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.COMMENT_TEXT, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_REASON_CODE, AT_OFFENDERS_NA.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS NA_NOMS_NUMBER, AT_OFFENDERS_NA.LAST_NAME AS NA_LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_NA.FIRST_NAME AS NA_FIRST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDERS_NA, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_NA, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS.OFFENDER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_NA.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS.OFFENDER_ID AND AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS.NS_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_NA.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_NA.OFFENDER_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code(s)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */ AND AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_EXPIRY_DATE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_NA.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for NOMS Number','A','Offender\NOMS Number',Multi,Free,Persistent,,User:0) */))), dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.LIVING_UNITS AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, undefined_ WHERE ((AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_ALL_LIVING_UNITS.LIVING_UNIT_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT NA_NOMS_NUMBER FROM DP0_)) AND (undefined)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: NAs in list
dataset.query: DP0_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.COMMENT_TEXT, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_REASON_CODE, AT_OFFENDERS_NA.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS NA_NOMS_NUMBER, AT_OFFENDERS_NA.LAST_NAME AS NA_LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_NA.FIRST_NAME AS NA_FIRST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDERS_NA, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_NA, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS.OFFENDER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_NA.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS.OFFENDER_ID AND AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_NON_ASSOCIATIONS.NS_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_NA.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_NA.OFFENDER_ID) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code(s)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,,Not_Persistent,,User:3) */) /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Establishment/''Establishment Code'' */ AND AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_EXPIRY_DATE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_NA.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for NOMS Number','A','Offender\NOMS Number',Multi,Free,Persistent,,User:0) */))), dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_NA.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_EXPIRY_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_REASON_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.COMMENT_TEXT, AT_OFFENDERS_NA.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_NA.FIRST_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDERS_NA, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS, undefined_ WHERE ((AT_OFFENDERS_NA.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_NA_DETAILS.NS_OFFENDER_ID) AND AT_OFFENDERS_NA.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM DP0_)) AND (undefined)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, NS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, NS_TYPE, NS_EXPIRY_DATE, NS_REASON_CODE, COMMENT_TEXT, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, PRISONER_LOCATION.UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT AS V_OFF_CELL_LOCATION, NA_LOC.UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT AS V_NA_LOC FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (V_SAME_PRISON IN (1)))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (V_SAME_PRISON IN (1)))
